title: Google\Cloud\Build\V1\StorageSource
name: StorageSource
description:
Location of the source in an archive file in Google Cloud Storage.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.cloudbuild.v1.StorageSource

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.bucket
params.description: Google Cloud Storage bucket containing the source (see Bucket Name Requirements).

params.name: data.object
params.description: Google Cloud Storage object containing the source. This object must be a gzipped archive file (.tar.gz) containing source to build.

params.name: data.generation
params.description: Google Cloud Storage generation for the object. If the generation is omitted, the latest generation will be used.

methods.description:
